Package com.epimorphics.lda.renderers.velocity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Help  
    Help.Format
    A representation of an available LDA result format, comprised of its name, its media type (as a string), and the URL of the "corresponding" page to link to to see it in that representation.
    Help.View  
    IdMap
    An IdMap associates a string id with a resource.
    ShortNames  
    VelocityCore  
    VelocityCore.Utils
    Utilities for template code that it can't make from the otherwise-available Wrapped methods and context data.
    VelocityCore.Utils.Param  
    VelocityRenderer  
    WrappedNode
    A WrappedNode is an RDF node wrapped in a shell of useful methods to be called from Velocity templates.
    WrappedNode.Bundle
    Struct holding the short-names and id maps.
    WrappedString
